personal.name: Vishnu Sai Jaswanth
personal.title: Senior Software Development Engineer (SDE-3)
personal.bio: Senior Backend Engineer with 3+ years of experience architecting scalable distributed systems, AI/ML integrations, and high-performance applications. Proven track record of leading technical initiatives, optimizing system performance by 5x, and delivering solutions that directly impact business metrics. Expertise in system design, microservices architecture, and building fault-tolerant systems at scale.

achievements.title: AI/ML Integration Leadership
achievements.description: Led end-to-end integration of Gemini AI and O3-mini models into production systems, handling async processing, function calling, and real-time inference pipelines across multiple environments. Built comprehensive testing and monitoring for AI model performance.

achievements.title: Performance Engineering Excellence
achievements.description: Refactored critical backend services to async patterns, optimized database queries, and implemented efficient caching strategies - achieving 5x improvement in response times and handling 10M+ daily events with sub-second latency.

achievements.title: Enterprise Integration Platform
achievements.description: Architected unified data synchronization service supporting Shopify, Zendesk, and Salesforce with real-time progress tracking, fault-tolerant webhook processing, and automated retry mechanisms. Reduced manual data entry by 90%.

achievements.title: Data Infrastructure & Analytics
achievements.description: Built comprehensive data clustering platform using Elasticsearch, Pinecone, and custom ML algorithms processing millions of customer interactions. Implemented automated insights generation reducing manual analysis time by 80%.

achievements.title: DevOps & Release Management
achievements.description: Implemented CI/CD pipelines with Google Cloud triggers, automated deployment workflows for multiple repositories, and comprehensive monitoring systems - reducing deployment time by 60% and deployment errors by 75%.

achievements.title: Recognition & Leadership
achievements.description: Awarded 'Best Employee of the Quarter' (Q1 2025) at BIK for technical leadership in cross-functional initiatives, system architecture design, and mentoring team members on best practices and system design principles.

projects.title: AI-Powered Customer Analytics Platform
projects.description: Enterprise-grade analytics platform processing millions of customer interactions using advanced ML clustering algorithms. Built with Elasticsearch, Pinecone, and custom AI models for real-time insights generation. Handles 10M+ daily events with sub-second latency.
projects.imageAlt: AI-powered analytics dashboard showing customer interaction clustering and insights

projects.title: Enterprise Integration Hub
projects.description: Complete live chat and data synchronization platform supporting Zendesk, Salesforce, and Shopify. Features real-time agent handover, webhook processing with automatic retry mechanisms, and comprehensive progress tracking. Built fault-tolerant architecture handling enterprise-scale operations.
projects.imageAlt: Enterprise integration dashboard showing real-time data synchronization between platforms

projects.title: Release Management & DevOps Platform
projects.description: Comprehensive release management system with automated deployment pipelines, real-time progress tracking, and monitoring. Features CI/CD automation, cloud triggers, and comprehensive logging - used by internal engineering teams for deployment automation.
projects.imageAlt: DevOps dashboard showing deployment pipelines and monitoring metrics

projects.title: RapidMock API Platform
projects.description: Developer-focused API mocking platform accelerating frontend development by 50%. Enables rapid iteration on UI features by simulating various API responses without backend dependencies. Serves 1000+ active developers with 99.9% uptime.
projects.imageAlt: RapidMock platform interface showing API endpoint management and response simulation

projects.title: Scalable Camping Platform
projects.description: Full-stack camping platform with microservices architecture, JWT authentication, geospatial search, and real-time reviews. Demonstrates scalable system design and modern web development practices.
projects.imageAlt: YelpCamp platform showing camping site listings with photos and reviews
